pavement.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a hard level surface or path at the side of a road for people to walk on
pavement.translation[0].definitions[0].e: A small group of journalists waited on the pavement outside her house.
pavement.translation[0].definitions[1].d: the hard surface of a road
pavement.translation[0].definitions[1].e: As she fell off the bike, her head hit the pavement.
